tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am petrified of visiting a dentist. Dr. Perola Menon put me at ease. Explained the line of treatment. Was very reassuring and she had the most amazing light hand. 
I have found a dentist who has taken away my fear of dentists.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Menon has been my dentist and the dentist for my family for the past 26 years. She has a wonderfully  friendly and soothing manner and a warm smile which puts both adults and children at ease immediately.  She has immense experience and has shown exceptional competence in whatever work she has undertaken for myself & family, whether it is a simple cleaning or bleaching, or complex procedures like root canal , impacted wisdom tooth extraction or what she did recently, a dental implant. 
I have complete trust in her and would never go to anybody else. I would strongly recommend her to anybody who wants painless and the best possible dental treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
The doctor takes you through the journey, not leaving you clueless. What matters to you, matters to her. The entire experience was more than professional, there was a personal touch and association bringing about not just the friendliness but also the trust. The doctor comes across not just friendly, *** ** **** ************ and guides you with do's and dont's.
I absolutely loved the staff, that greeted me and asked me how i was doing. They always had a smile and were helpful throughout. The entire experience was amazing, and makes me want to visit again without any hesitation.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I have been a patient of Dr. Menon for over 6 - 7 years, and I have always been so happy with her professionalism, kindness, courtesy *** ******* She is gentle with her patients, explains the problem very clearly, as well the procedure she is going to undertake to solve the issue. I find this very re-assuring in a doctor.

The staff in the clinic also reflect this kind, courteous and professional attitude. Appointment times are adhered to, which is such a rarity amongst doctors in India. I have never had to wait more than a few minutes beyond my designated appointment time.

Normally, a visit to the dentist always engenders stress, apprehension, and sometimes even fear amongst patients. I feel none of these emotions going to Dr. Menon.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Visited Dr Perola Menon for root canal surgery and scaling/ polishing of my teeth. She explained the problem that I was facing and the resolution process to be carried out very clearly. 

Found her to be very professional , gentle with her hands and skillful at her work .The root canal process was painless and was performed in just 45 minutes.

The clinic is clean , well maintained , hygienic and covid protocals were adhered to strictly. The staff was polite and organised.

 Highly recommend this clinic - Pradeep

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
There are several factors which made my visit to the  doctor very memorable:
1.The doctor is very friendly and full of compassion which rubs off on you.
2. The doctor always does a  thorough professional job.
3. Gets in external assistance from specialists when necessary
4.There is a strong feeling of  a family atmosphere
5. The support staff in the clinic are always cheerful and supportive
6. The ambience of the clinic is attractive with soft music  playing
7. The last little thing that delighted me was that while my teeth were being drilled and patched  and being knocked out I could look out of the window and watch the leaves of a huge tree rustling gently in the  breeze 
making each sitting a delight to the soul.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
The experience at The Dental Care Clinic was very pleasant and free of any hassles. Dr Menon handled the procedure both efficiently and graciously while patiently answering all my questions. I was a little concerned with a cap that had aged a bit and her comprehensive examination and tips to keep it going for a few more years were very reassuring.
It was also a pleasant surprise  to see how the clinic has adapted to handle the concerns and risks associated with COVID. Right from the waiting area and throughout the procedure the team has put together a slew of safety measures to minimise risk of infection. Kudos to Dr Menon and her team!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Wow,! My experience was awesome. Right from the time you enter the Clinic, the ambience, decor, the soft music and the courtesy extended by each of the clinic staff makes one feel so special. Dr. Perola herself is so soft spoken, very gentle during the treatment. Using A class material and the very best. Her advice during the treatment is so customized that one can't wait to go through the process, which has always been beyond expectation. Spectacular ! 
What's more is when you drop in at any time, one is offered water, tea or coffee.  The staff is at your beck and call inspite of their meticulous commitments.
The clinic is hygienically maintained. 
I so much appreciate Dr. Perola's treatment and have started recommending her globally.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Excellent Doctor, very high quality, caring and with a good team.
Advises on what is really required and in the best interest of the patient

tags: None
review: Dr Perola Menon is not only an excellent dental practitioner, but has a wonderful approach. She takes the trouble to explain in detail her diagnosis, willingly answers questions, explains alternatives, makes her recommendations, explains the prognosis and in short ensures that her patients are well-informed and reassured. Her treatments are sensitively administered and long-lasting and no time is wasted on repeated visits. She is a thorough professional with a most pleasant demeanour. I would have no hesitation in warmly recommending her.

review: Excellent care. Very hygienic, courteous and efficient doctor and staff. Would highly recommend and have done to all my friends and family. Dr. Menon is very gentle and has a wonderful light touch and is very considerate. Wonderful clinic and experience all told.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Perola explains every step of the procedure. She’s patient,  very caring and is attentive to the needs of the patient. Even before leaving the chair she explains well the after care that needs to be followed. 

I am always very scared to visit a dentist and it is this fear that has led to so many dental issues I have today. However,  with Dr Perola’s gentle touch and her caring nature all my fears have vanished. 

Thank you Dr. Perola.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I have been going to Dr Menon since many years and can highly recommend her for her skill and professionalism, her approachability and concern for her patients; and her clean, hygienic clinic and facilities.
Above all, she has a very sure and gentle "hand".

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr Perola Menon is the kindest & most friendly orthodontist I've known. She is able to handle her patients' dental issues with her easy manner of speaking. Her cosmetic treatment is the best I've experienced in Mumbai so far. 
I wish her all the very best in her dental practice.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Place is clean and with latest equipment. Staff friendly. Doctors were very knowledgeable, answered queries patiently and procedures were done with care and high standards of care. Dr Perola is an excellent doctor. I would highly recommend her and her team at The Dental Care Clinic!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: This was the first time I was attended to by Dr Perola Menon. She was very welcoming and patiently explained the treatment plan that I needed, with the benefits of each part of the plan. Even though teeth cleaning wasn't planned earlier, Dr Menon saw the necessity and conducted it proactively. Her clinic is well equipped and I would definitely recommend Dr Menon to other patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Pirola Menon is excellent. She gives you a detailed explanation of your problem and explains the dental procedure to correct it very thoroughly. She tries her best to be as gentle as possible and does a fantastic job. 
She is genuinely keen on helping her patients and gives plenty of time to you. 
She also goes to great lengths to explain dental hygiene to you.
I am very happy with her and would highly recommend her to my friends.

review: It was a pleasant moment for me to meet doctor with full of energy, cheerful welcome and friendly attitude which generates a positive vibrations in your mind and patient feels that his/her decision taken was perfectly right.  After series of explanations with full details, suggestions, guiding with straight forward reasoning after understanding patient's history her positive response etc.; besides her confidence, disciplin working methods and care taking were very well and beyond my expectations.  I was deeply touched and impressed and lucky to have such a professional and perfect doctor for my dental services.  She was so sweet and kind to me during her implant procedure along with her colleague doctor and complete team of workers (everyone kind, caring, sweet and with smiling faces).

review: I’ve been a patient of Dr. Menon’s for over 15 years. She has the most gentle hand and reassuring chair-side manner. This is why her patient appointments are always  booked. But she is always accommodating.

Thanks Dr. Menon! it was a very good experience.

review: The hygiene is exceptional, no hurry to get you off the chair till she is convinced that she has done her best for your teeth.

tags: None
review: Service and treatment was very well done and i would definitely reccommend friends and family to go to ger. I went in for a regular check up, however she realised I was on the verge of getting cavities in a couple of my teeth. She was kind enough to fit me in with another doctor since I didn't have a prior appointment for getting my teeth filled. I was well taken care and was made very comfortable during the procedure. Thank you so much doctor Perola.

review: Relaxed, friendly, quick, efficient, informative. The doctor was very patient, had a good “bedside” manner, answered all my questions directly and honestly.

review: Dr. Menon is one of the most friendly dentists I have ever met, and believe me I have met quite a few. She not only fixed the issue at hand but told about prevention in a very logical and detailed manner...
